import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { FrameInfo } from '../models/frame-info' @Component({ selector: 'app-frame', templateUrl: './frame.component.html', styleUrls: ['./frame.component.css'] }) export class FrameComponent { @Input() frame: FrameInfo = new FrameInfo(); }
